problem_description: The main servo motor of the robot arm does not respond when executing movement commands.
solution_description: Check power supply connections and verify that the safety relay is properly engaged.
author: Engineer A

problem_description: The robot controller shows an overheating warning after 20 minutes of operation.
solution_description: Inspect cooling fans and ensure proper ventilation in the control cabinet.
author: Engineer B

problem_description: Robot reports positional deviation greater than 0.5mm during calibration routine.
solution_description: Perform mechanical recalibration and verify encoder alignment.
author: Engineer C
